CustomField.description: Wipro Limited is a leading global information technology, consulting, and business process services company headquartered in Bengaluru, India. Established in 1945, Wipro offers a comprehensive range of services including IT solutions, cloud computing, data analytics, and digital transformation. With a strong presence in over 50 countries, Wipro is known for its commitment to innovation, sustainability, and excellence in delivering client-centric solutions. The company focuses on helping organizations navigate digital disruptions and achieve their business objectives through technology and industry expertise.
